name: The 7 lives of Buggy Pinball
description:
Use your arrows to move the board, get as much points as possible, and don't end up out of the board!

[Tip: if you get stuck in one of the thingies, your points will go up a lot. Like, a lot. Basically indefinitely.]

My second game, all done in 2h30m for Level Up Circle: Hardcore Jam #2 - which was actually one week long, but I just found out about it. The game surely requires additional fixes, but in a way I like how buggy it is.
